item.title: Ready, Set, Code
item.description: Ready, Set, Code! Recent code related posts on other website that piqued my interest 36 Amazing Python Open Source Projects (v.2019) Posted: April 22, 2019 This link has a brief summary of apps or projects written in python that are fun, useful, or interesting. Find it here How the heck does async/await work in Python 3.5? Posted: April 22, 2019

item.title: musings
item.description: "Musings" Read more Bronze Age Collapse on July 21, 2021 Where did the cities go? What happen to written language? Is there any other time in history where such a dramatic change in civilization took place? Writing disappeared for centuries (approx 1200 BCE - 800 BCE) so we are unable to know for sure why pervasive devastation around the Mediterranean Sea took place.
